name: Fusion (itch) (Deacon8)
description:
A scuffed puzzle game made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam

Making a puzzle game is hard

The levels are either going to be ridiculously easy or maybe too hard?

Get the key and exit using the door (Hopefully you can tell that it is a door)

Controls - Arrow Keys

Normalboy -Walks as well as swims

Rockboy - walks on spikes but sinks in water

Lavaboy - creates platforms on contact with water

Balloonboy - Floats over water and spikes, but cannot pick up keys

Challenged myself to learn Raylib and C in 24 hours. Pretty intense.
